In London with my UK counterpart @SajidJavid. Together, we will discuss our joint efforts to combat illegal migration at our common border, but also our essential bilateral cooperation as regards security and counterterrorism.
Thank you @CCastaner for coming to London. France and the UK have an unbreakable bond. I look forward to deepening our partnership further on illegal migration, serious crime and security

A town the size of Oldham every year. More than one Rochester a year. UK net immigration is out of control. UKIP wants to end mass immigration and reduce the figure to below 10,000 net a year. #GE2019 Common sense ideas for Brexit and Beyond.
Four towns the size of Bognor Regis, virtually another Southampton every year. Immigration is out of control. Looking to Brexit and beyond... #GeneralElection2019

End mass immigration. UKIP wants net migration down to below 10,000 a year. Temporary immigration for workers and students should be time-limited and strictly controlled. No asylum for migrants entering illegally from a safe country. #GeneralElection2019

Re-wilding a quarter of the UK is a lovely idea, but it isn't going happen now that England is as densely populated as India, and the UK has net legal immigration of 300,000 per year + unknown illegal immigration.

An Australian-style points system can be used to be increase or decrease immigration numbers. Does @BorisJohnson want to reduce the numbers? I don't think so.

In this video, Theresa May says that she agrees with Labour on ending free movement. Lies, lies, lies. As Home Sec she failed to control immigration, and she has failed again as PM. As for Labour, May should ask Diane Abbott where she stands on freedom of movement.

About time UK Government spoke up for Christians being persecuted, when I suggested we should accept some refugees I was told that religion was the wrong issue to decide this. It is not and never has been.

.@UKIP has abandoned the Australian-style points system for immigration. It is not tough enough. The UK needs time-limited work visas for scarce skills while we train our own young people to fill the skills gaps created under Blair/Brown/Cameron/May.

I can also confirm that @DHSCgovuk & NHS are doing everything we can to provide support to refugees arriving in the UK. /3

We are a generous, welcoming country with a strong sense of fairness. But too many people exploit our goodwill. We need more tools to tackle illegal entry, punish people smugglers & to support those that genuinely need protection. I welcome the new immigration plans.

Today I will hold an emergency @G7 meeting to coordinate our response to the crisis in Afghanistan. I will ask our friends and allies to stand by the Afghan people and step up support for refugees and humanitarian aid.

Today we take a positive step forward in our commitment to tackle illegal entry, punish people smugglers and safeguard those who are in genuine need of refuge. This is our fair but firm New Plan for Immigration

Our landmark #BordersBill passed by MPs yesterday will bring about the fundamental change needed to control illegal migration. I won't be deterred from doing what is right by the British people 'From my speech''' #NewPlanForImmigration

I'm delighted that the #BordersBill, which will break the deadly business model of the people-smugglers, has passed in the House of Commons just now. It will deliver a new, firm but fair asylum system to deter illegal migration. #NewPlanForImmigration'
€¦ The #BordersBill in the @HouseofCommons today will create a faster and fairer asylum system that supports the most vulnerable in genuine need " not the people smugglers. #NewPlanForImmigration'

We're taking action to deter dangerous & illegal migration with our #BordersBill: Breaking the people-smugglers' deadly business model.' Supporting those in genuine need via safe & legal routes.'€º€ Making it easier to remove illegal arrivals with no right to be here.'''

The Borders Bill will improve access to legal advice and require all reasons for asylum and protection to be put forward for consideration in one go, putting a stop the repeated claims. #NewPlanForImmigration '"
Our firm but fair Borders Bill is back in the Commons today. It will help minimise delays in our immigration system by preventing repeated appeals in cases the courts have ruled to be without merit.

Our landmark Borders Bill will make illegal migration no longer worth the risk. As it makes its way through Parliament, we're looking at every option to stop people dying at the hands of the people smugglers.

We're ending the use of insecure ID cards for entry into the UK to strengthen our border and deliver on the people's priority to take back control of our immigration system. Firm on those who seek to abuse the system. Fair on those who play by the rules. #NewPlanForImmigration
This week we have been hosting an important summit at an historic location, as we look to tackle terrorism, illegal migration and online sexual abuse with our international partners. #G7UK

Our teams have been working round the clock to bring vulnerable Afghans to safety. This week we've: ",Accelerated the application process by deploying Border Force officers to Afghanistan. ",Announced a new safe & legal route for Afghan refugees that puts women & children 1st.
We will not abandon people who have been forced to flee their homes and are now living in terror of what might come next. The Afghan citizens' resettlement scheme will save lives. ''€°'
Around half of refugees resettled through government-backed schemes have been children. Global Britain will continue to show global leadership in welcoming those most in need. #BordersBill

Access to the UK's asylum system should be based on need, not the ability to pay people smugglers. That's why I'm introducing the Borders Bill to Parliament today. We're creating a fairer system for those in genuine need & for British taxpayers '''
Tomorrow our landmark Borders Bill will be introduced to Parliament, setting out an asylum system based on genuine need that is fair, but firm. Learn more about why we need a #NewPlanForImmigration

Today we're introducing the landmark into Parliament. We're taking action to deter dangerous and illegal migration to the UK and create a new asylum system that's fair for those in genuine need. Firm but fair. #NewPlanForImmigration'

Enough is enough. Next week we'll introduce the Borders Bill to go after these gangs exploiting people & deter illegal entry with tougher criminal offences for those attempting to enter the UK illegally. Part of our firm but fair #NewPlanForImmigration'

The new Graduate Immigration route I've launched today will keep the best and brightest international talent contributing to the UK. This is part of our new points-based immigration system retaining people based on the skills they can offer to the UK.
€ Helping refugees whose lives are in danger. € Making sure they properly integrate into our society. € Ending illegal migration to the UK. This is the #NewPlanForImmigration'  #RefugeeWeek

These are the dangerous conditions that criminal gangs are using to facilitate illegal immigration. The man responsible has been sentenced to 2 years and 7 months. Our #NewPlanForImmigration will break the business model of people smuggling networks and save lives.

Next month, the Borders Bill enters Parliament. We must act now to stop illegal migration. We must break the cruel business of the gangs who treat people like commodities. This is what the #NewPlanForImmigration will deliver.
We're going after the people-smuggling gangs at the source. To stop them exploiting vulnerable people. To stop them facilitating illegal migration to the UK'''#NewPlanforImmigration'

This week I officially opened the @UKHomeOffice-funded Ghana Immigration Taskforce Office. Enabling us to tackle organised immigration crime at source in Ghana, combat document fraud & see perpetrators of immigration crime exploiting vulnerable people brought to justice.' ''­

People smugglers are ruthless, treating migrants as a commodity and they do not care about the safety of those they transport. Working with partners we are determined to do all we can to disrupt and dismantle the organised criminal groups involved.

Criminal people-smuggling gangs are putting lives at risk via dangerous and illegal crossings. Enough is enough. Our New Plan for Immigration will break their business model and toughen sentences for arranging illegal entry to the UK.'''

To stop the deaths of those taking dangerous, illegal journeys, we must stop the trade in people that causes them. Our New Plan for Immigration will save lives and target people smugglers.
Our New Plan for Immigration will deliver fairness and correct historical injustices in British Nationality Law.
Our New Plan for Immigration will create a faster and fairer system that supports the most vulnerable in genuine need.
'Our New Plan for Immigration will deter illegal entry into the UK. It will break the business model of people smugglers and protect the lives of those they endanger.

We will never shirk our obligations to unaccompanied asylum seeking children and to suggest otherwise is false.

The Government's first priority should be to its own people. With over 6,000 veterans out on the street, how can the Home Office justify this?

The Tories decimated our armed forces, now they are filling up the empty barracks with illegal migrants. Is this what taking back control looks like? Why not use them to house the UK's 6000 homeless veterans?

Media vultures currently trying to aggravate #DominicCummings in order to get a reaction. Why have they not been this passionate on illegal immigrants flooding the country and potentially importing the virus? Or Labour politicians flagrantly flouting the lockdown?
Staggering how much attention Dominic Cummings travelling to #Durham has received from the MSM. Not a peep from them about illegal immigration, however... #Dominicsgoing
Why is our foreign secretary cosying up to a country that is purposefully flooding Greece and the rest of Europe with migrants?
Immigration minister Chris Philp (who nobody has ever even heard of) had meetings in Paris today and says we now have an action plan that will counter illegal crossings. Don't hold your breath folks.

Official figures show that approaching 500 illegal immigrants crossed the Channel this week. I predicted an invasion and it is happening. Government say they will return many. I don't believe a word of it.

A record 167 illegal migrants have come into Dover today, including 60 in one boat. I have warned about the invasion and now it is happening. People will be very angry with a government that pretends but never acts.

As I predicted weeks ago, Pett Level is a favoured landing beach for migrants. This exclusive video from Saturday shows a group being caught. Many more are not. This is proof that the sneering media were wrong to attack me for my film.
It is only a matter of time before there is a mid-channel collision and people lose their lives.

On a day of national celebration we are being humiliated on the South Coast. As I have predicted, a record number of illegal immigrants have been taken into Dover. All along the coast there are many more. This is the beginning of an invasion.
The illegal migrant scandal is bigger than anybody realises. Our government should stop the boats from coming, not help them to shore. Mark my words this issue is not going away.
